title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 34-2.10 - Waste disposal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 34-2.10 - Waste disposal

State Regulations

The disposal or payment for disposal by a clinical laboratory for a health services purveyor of hazardous waste, radioactive waste and/or regulated medical waste shall be deemed consideration given for referral of specimens for performance of clinical laboratory services, and is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
34-2.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
